ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Sta. MAU.101 Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin, 19°43'N 16°59'W, depth 61-78 m, sticky grey mud with some sand and shell gravel, spi- dercrabs (Inachus, Macropodia), bivalves, gastropods, tubeworms,hermitcrabs,flatfish, 2.4 m Agassiz trawl, 16.vi.1988.
